info.description: This API definition facilitates auditing static analysis alerts using classifiers, optional adaptive heuristics, and alert prioritization. The API enables jump-starting labeled datasets using test suites. It is intended to enable a wide range of users (with widely varying datasets, static analysis tools, machine learning expertise, and amount of labeled data) to benefit from using classifiers and sophisticated prioritization to automatically triage static analysis alerts.
info.title: SCAIFE Registration and Login Module API Definition
